about_the_game:
Take Your Shot in Viper Squad

Step into the high-stakes, adrenaline-fueled world of Viper Squad. In this sci-fi multiplayer FPS, every decision, every shot, and every teammate counts. Assemble your squad, outthink your opponents, and climb the ranks to claim your spot as a legend in the Exoleague.

---

What Sets Viper Squad Apart?

🔥 Multiplayer Modes That Keep You on Your Toes

Whether you're all about fast action or tactical teamwork, Viper Squad has a mode for you:

Team Deathmatch: Quick, intense, and all about who’s got the sharper reflexes.

Objective-Based Missions: Work together, outsmart the enemy, and secure the win.

Custom Matches: Create your own rules, choose your favorite maps, and play your way.

---

🎖️ Earn Your Place in the Exoleague

We get it—rising through the ranks isn’t just about playing; it’s about proving you’re the best.

Climb through six distinct ranks, from Recruit to the ultimate Apex.

Earn Ascension Points (AP) for kills, assists, and objectives. Every match matters.

Feel the tension as your rank adjusts in real-time after each game.

This isn’t just about winning—it’s about leaving your mark.

---

⚔️ Play Your Way with Unique Classes

Build your perfect squad with four specialized roles:

Shadowrunner: Strike from the shadows and disappear just as fast.

Siegebreaker: The heavy-hitter who absorbs damage and keeps fighting.

Medic: Your lifeline in the chaos, healing and reviving teammates.

Engineer: Control the battlefield with traps, gadgets, and tactical ingenuity.

Each class brings its own abilities and playstyle. Experiment. Strategize. Dominate.

---

🌌 Fight Across a Sci-Fi World in Chaos

From crumbling space stations to sprawling neon-lit cities, every map feels alive.

Navigate environmental hazards, shifting terrain, and dynamic lighting that keeps battles unpredictable.

Whether you're ducking behind cover or scaling a rooftop for the perfect shot, every map tells its own story.

---

💡 Customization Without Limits

This is your fight—make it your own.

Personalize your loadout with weapons, attachments, and futuristic gadgets.

Unlock skins and cosmetics that let you stand out in the heat of battle.

---

Why Viper Squad?

It’s simple: we designed this game for players who love the rush of competition but also want a game that’s fun to master. Whether you're diving into quick matches with friends or grinding your way to the top of the Exoleague, there's always a new challenge waiting for you.

name: Viper Squad

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 (2 GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti (6 GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space

short_description: "Outsmart. Overload. Dominate." Viper Squad brings high-stakes strategy to a futuristic FPS. Build your squad, master unique classes, and experience the explosive Overload Mode. Your skills, your legacy, your battlefield. Add Viper Squad to your wishlist and change the game.
